messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Remember, free gun, ANY gun from armory if you capture or kill the HoP, Bonus ammunition if you capture him alive

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Engineering Foyer.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I'm gonna try and get enough credits for the supermatter shuttle ye

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, a whoop of wire eating mammals have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.
